import React, { Component } from 'react' import empty from "../../../styles/empty.png" import half from "../../../styles/half.png" import full from "../../../styles/full.png" import "./rating.scss" function getStar(value){ switch(value){ case 0: return empty case 50: return half case 100: return full default: return empty } } function getStars(value){ switch (parseFloat(value)){ case 0.0: return [0,0,0,0,0] case 0.5: return [50,0,0,0,0] case 1.0: return [100,0,0,0,0] case 1.5: return [100,50,0,0,0] case 2.0: return [100,100,0,0,0] case 2.5: return [100,100,50,0,0] case 3.0: return [100,100,100,0,0] case 3.5: return [100,100,100,50,0] case 4.0: return [100,100,100,100,0] case 4.5: return [100,100,100,100,50] case 5.0: return [100,100,100,100,100] default: return[0,0,0,0] } } export default class Rating extends Component { render() { return (
{ getStars(2.5).map(value => ( )) }
) } }
